welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fazakerley, charming town of southern England! Known for its rich history and beautiful countryside, we invite you to discover and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but there is a premium option for faster speeds.
